title: Suspiria, or Sighs on the death of the late most illustrious monarch Charles the II. King of Great Britain, France and Ireland, &c. who changed his earthly for a heavenly crown, on Friday the 6th. February, 168⁴/₅. In the 37th year of His reign, and 55th of his age.
publicationStmtPublisher: Re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty,
